item.title: How do i stop syipkpkers and or ddosing pls reply
item.dc:creator: @edge1 edge®
item.description:
@edge1 wrote:

i am currently making a ddos Blocker, so i think ima sell or release it on these forums.

a lil explaination:

if you get ddosed it will AUTOMATICLY Reject all the files and connection and will REFLECT it. so the one who starts with the ddos will crash him/her self.

For syipkers, Just make your server able to connect only to 1 client. Example:
Readbyte(317);
and server sided the same, that means that everyone who WANTS to log in, can only log in if they are using YOUR client.

Enjoyyy =D

Read full topic

item.title: How do i stop syipkpkers and or ddosing pls reply
item.dc:creator: @Koolvin Koolvin
item.description:
@Koolvin wrote:

Only real way to stop ddosing is to either get a not shitty ISP (which will not effectively stop, but will help prosecute) or to keep your IP very firmly hidden. For the syi whatevers, limit the amount of connections for one IP.

Read full topic
